metadata.description: Viewers are able to experience fourÂ diverse performances while listening to the musical history of the exploitations and suffering endured by Latin Americans.Â Each performance expresses a sense of tradition through the music and dances explored. There is aÂ reoccurring theme of Spanish conquest and suffering throughout the four performances as well asÂ an emphasis on Chilean culture. We are alsoÂ able to witness one ofÂ the traditional dances of Chile; the Cueca.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Festival Latino Americano
